title: Sampler, 1816
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Vashti Wellington born in Westmoreland, N.H. April 10, 1805 Ae 11  Wrought in 1816
provenance:
By 1945, Mrs. Mary S. M. Gibson
1945, Museum of the Arts of Decoration of the Cooper Union
creditline: Gift of Mary S. M. Gibson
description: The field is divided in three sections: bands of alphabets and numerals at the top, a verse and inscription in the middle, and an incomplete basket of flowers at the bottom. With stylized floral and strawberry vine borders on four sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1816.
1816. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Gift of Mary S. M. Gibson. 1945-54-17.
